name: Feasting on Fears
description:
Welcome Freunde :D

Today we are presenting you an awesome game where you feed your fears to a monster, which grows depending on your fears.

Gorgeous art styles and soundtracks await you!!

Crew - Die rehabilitierten Nudeln

Isabelle Posch - Artist

Elias Tieber - Sound, Artist

Sina Anders - Artist, Animation

Dominik Grigoras - Programmieren

Caro Weixler - Animation
